data.content: g3y1.5.3 complete: Validated table/filter/sort/hierarchy for Knots repos. Tests cover: filter by state (queued/in_action/exact), type, priority, label; hierarchy inference from dotted IDs via buildHierarchy(); sort via compareBeatsByPriorityThenState; search across title/description/ID; query expressions (type:task, state:shipped). All 27 tests pass in knots-guardrails.test.ts. Ref: 0a6e4ab..26712a8
